post.text: Anyone who sees and treats women this way is unfit to be president.

comment.author: Steven
comment.text: Go Hilary I voted for you who cares about emails they been doing this for many elections. But since your a woman & your standing your ground you got them scared!!!!! Hahaha who wants trumpie go blue don't!!!

replies.author: Steven
replies.text: And who is worried about that! Not I!....

replies.author: Heather
replies.text: Hillary was not even honest enough to reveal that Donna Brazile gave her debate questions in advance !
